db:article.db:para: This warning category is spelled [syntax.duplicate-ids] by qmllint.

db:section.db:title: What happened?
db:section.db:para: You used the same value for different ids.

db:section.db:title: Why is this bad?
db:section.db:para: The QML language forbids duplicate ids: they should all be unique in the same QML component.

db:section.db:title: Example
db:section.db:para: To fix this warning, rename the duplicate to become unique:
